task.title: Install the Node Controller
task.shortdesc: The Eucalyptus Node Controller controls virtual machine activities, including the running, verification, and termination of virtual machine instances.

step.cmd: On the machine you plan to use as the Node Controller, mount the Eucalyptus FastStart media and run fastinstall.sh. For example:
At the prompt for the Frontend server, enter n.

info.codeblock: Will this be the front-end server in your cloud? [Y|n]n

taskbody.result: When the installation process is finished, the machine will reboot automatically and be ready to run.
taskbody.postreq: You are now ready to install the FastStart Frontend.
